creator: jstrachman@athenium.com
text:
I'd like to be able to set a variable equal to a value that I get from a stored
cookie and use it in HTML requests.

Example:
Add a cookie manager.  Let's say you get a cookie with a parameter named "Bob"
with a value of "Bob's value".  I'd like to be able to include this value in a
POST or GET request.  (e.g. submit a form with "Bob's value" included somewhere)

creator: jstrachman@athenium.com
text:
FYI, I found a way around this for my app, so unless anyone else needs this 
functionality, you might just want to mark it as WONTFIX.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Current version of JMeter (2.0) stores cookie values as variables, so for 
example you can retrieve the value of Bob by using the string ${Bob}
